ygData.subject: Re: Kelin`s Lucid Lullaby
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The other (albeit related) Caveat is that if you are grouped with folks who have AEs as thier big damage spells, or more than one druid who wants to cast
ygData.messageBody:
>The only caveat is that your group *must* attack only one
>target at a time, and a healer is *highly* desirable because
>all the monsters will really hate you for putting them to
>sleep.


The other (albeit related) Caveat is that if you are grouped with folks who
have AEs as thier big damage spells, or more than one druid who wants to
cast swarm, or you plan to use DDD/CoD there is no point in Lulling them.
Mostly these days I just slow em down and takes my beatings...

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
